notesStmt.note: A translation, by Henry Watson, of: Valentin et Orson.
Printer's name from, and publication date and format conjectured by STC.
"Text of chap. 4 begins on B5r: Whan the Archebysshop .."--STC.
Imperfect; consists of leaves B3-6 only.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
